definition: to exist/to deposit/to store/to keep/to survive

sentences.english: Hitlers come and go, but Germany and the German people remain.
sentences.chinese: 希特勒來了又走，德意志與德國人民長存。

sentences.english: Sihon king of the Amorites His love endures forever.
sentences.chinese: 就是殺戮亞摩利王西宏，因他的慈愛永遠長存。

sentences.english: 5 who by his understanding made the heavens, His love endures forever.
sentences.chinese: 稱謝那用智慧造天的，因他的慈愛永遠長存。

sentences.english: And Og the king of Bashan: for his mercy endureth for ever
sentences.chinese: 又殺巴珊王噩，因他的慈愛永遠長存。

sentences.english: Give thanks to the God of heaven. His love endures forever.
sentences.chinese: 你們要稱謝天上的神，因他的慈愛永遠長存。

sentences.english: Let us die young, or let us live forever.
sentences.chinese: 就讓我們在年輕的時候死去，或者，讓我們永世長存。

sentences.english: His love lasts forever and His love is everywhere.
sentences.chinese: 他的愛永遠長存，他的愛遍滿全地。

sentences.english: Long lives the friendship between Mauritius& China.
Friendships remian and never can end.
In his days the righteous will flourish; prosperity will abound till the moon is no more.
sentences.chinese: 在他的日子義人要發旺，大有平安，好像月亮長存。

sentences.english: 13 to him who divided the Red Sea asunder His love endures forever.
sentences.chinese: 稱謝那分裂紅海的，因他的慈愛永遠長存。

sentences.english: Our deep friendship has lasted for years.
O give thanks unto the God of heaven: for his mercy endureth for ever.
sentences.chinese: 你們要稱謝天上的神，因他的慈愛永遠長存。

sentences.english: Temples and statues decay, but books survieve.
sentences.chinese: 寺廟會倒坍，神像會朽爛，而書卻經久長存。

sentences.english: To him that stretched out the earth above the waters: for his mercy endureth for ever.
sentences.chinese: 稱謝那鋪地在水以上的，因他的慈愛永遠長存。

sentences.english: 7 who made the great lights- His love endures forever.
sentences.chinese: 稱謝那造成大光的，因他的慈愛永遠長存。

definition: a sage/wise and holy man/virtuous ruler/Buddhist lama/wine
that being the case/then/in that case
this life/to lose face/to be disgraced
Anle district of Keelung City 基隆市[Ji1 long2 shi4], Taiwan
